pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, February 6, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will join the Prime Minister and participate in a roundtable discussion with the Federation of Canadian Municipalities’ Big City Mayors’ Caucus.

Main Ballroom
Fairmont Château Laurier
1 Rideau Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage of the Prime Minister’s remarks for FCM-accredited media. For accreditation, please contact media@fcm.ca.
  • Media are asked to present themselves to the Laurier Room no later than 9:30 a.m.
